entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 9:46AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Frost Possible Tonight... Frost is possible tonight across the Eastern Interior, including Fairbanks. Clear skies this evening will allow temperatures to fall rapidly after sunset, with temperature dropping into the 30s after midnight. Frost will be most likely in low lying areas. Clouds moving north over the area on Thursday morning will cause
